column1: DONE - get level adapter to be able to trigger on scope (TTL -> NIM)
DONE - remember to set TLU threshold to ~-300 mV for FEI4 hitOr (default for scintillator PMTs and scope - 40 mV)
- prepare and calibrate sensors well in advance
- have one well understood reference sample to start with
- start from the coldest point and perform measurements with warmer and warmer box!
- Give the gateway iMac a fixed address
